# iosxr_mpls_ldp_address_family (Data Source)

This data source can read the MPLS LDP Address Family configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_mpls_ldp_address_family" "example" {
  af_name = "ipv4"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `af_name` (String) Configure Address Family and its parameters

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `discovery_targeted_hello_accept` (Boolean) Accept and respond to targeted hellos
- `discovery_targeted_hello_accept_from` (String) IP Access list to specify acceptable targeted hello sources
- `discovery_transport_address_ipv4` (String) IP address to be used as transport address
- `discovery_transport_address_ipv6` (String) IP address to be used as transport address
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `label_local_advertise_disable` (Boolean) Disable label advertisement to all peers for all prefixes
- `label_local_advertise_explicit_null` (Boolean) Configure explicit-null advertisement
- `label_local_advertise_explicit_null_for_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on destination prefixes
- `label_local_advertise_explicit_null_for_acl_to_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on LDP Peers
- `label_local_advertise_explicit_null_to_acl` (String) IP Access-list specifying controls on LDP Peers
- `label_local_advertise_for_access_lists` (Attributes List) Prefix centric outbound label filtering (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--label_local_advertise_for_access_lists))
- `label_local_advertise_interfaces` (Attributes List) Advertise interface host address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--label_local_advertise_interfaces))
- `label_local_advertise_to_neighbors` (Attributes List) neighbor (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--label_local_advertise_to_neighbors))
- `label_local_allocate_for_access_list` (String) IP access-list
- `label_local_allocate_for_host_routes` (Boolean) Allocate label for host routes only
- `label_local_default_route` (Boolean) Enable MPLS forwarding for default route
- `label_local_implicit_null_override_for` (String) Limit implicit-null label use to a set of prefixes
- `label_remote_accept_from_neighbors` (Attributes List) Neighbor from whom to accept label advertisement (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--label_remote_accept_from_neighbors))
- `neighbor_ipv4_targeted` (Attributes List) Establish targeted session (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbor_ipv4_targeted))
- `neighbor_ipv6_targeted` (Attributes List) Establish targeted session (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbor_ipv6_targeted))
- `neighbor_sr_policies` (Attributes List) Segment Routing policy name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbor_sr_policies))
- `redistribute_bgp_advertise_to` (String) IP access list specifying LDP peers to advertise
- `redistribute_bgp_as` (String) bgp as-number
- `traffic_eng_auto_tunnel_mesh_groups` (Attributes List) Configure an auto-tunnel mesh group of interfaces in LDP (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--traffic_eng_auto_tunnel_mesh_groups))
- `traffic_eng_auto_tunnel_mesh_groups_all` (Boolean) Enable LDP on all TE meshgroup interfaces

### Nested Schema for `label_local_advertise_for_access_lists`

Read-Only:

- `access_list_name` (String) Prefix centric outbound label filtering
- `to` (String) IP access-list for LDP peers

### Nested Schema for `label_local_advertise_interfaces`

Read-Only:

- `interface_name` (String) Advertise interface host address

### Nested Schema for `label_local_advertise_to_neighbors`

Read-Only:

- `for` (String) IP access-list for prefixes to be sent
- `label_space_id` (Number) Label Space Id of neighbor
- `neighbor_address` (String) neighbor address


<a id="nestedatt--label_remote_accept_from_neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `label_remote_accept_from_neighbors`

Read-Only:

- `for` (String) IP access-list for destination prefixes
- `label_space_id` (Number) Label Space Id of neighbor
- `neighbor_address` (String) Neighbor from whom to accept label advertisement


<a id="nestedatt--neighbor_ipv4_targeted"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbor_ipv4_targeted`

Read-Only:

- `neighbor_address` (String) IP address of neighbor


<a id="nestedatt--neighbor_ipv6_targeted"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbor_ipv6_targeted`

Read-Only:

- `neighbor_address` (String) IP address of neighbor


<a id="nestedatt--neighbor_sr_policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbor_sr_policies`

Read-Only:

- `policy_name` (String) Segment Routing policy name
- `targeted` (Boolean) Establish targeted session


<a id="nestedatt--traffic_eng_auto_tunnel_mesh_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `traffic_eng_auto_tunnel_mesh_groups`

Read-Only:

- `group_id` (Number) Configure an auto-tunnel mesh group of interfaces in LDP
